attributes.action: Allow British citizens to vote BNP without risking our jobs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believew it is our fundamental right in a democracy, to vote for whichever political party we wish, without fear of prejudice, without risking our jobs, affecting our career prospects, or altering our status in the community.

rejection.details: There is no prohibition on voting BNP.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
